entry.title: äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾
entry.content:
æ³¨æ„ç‚¹ï¼š

  • high=num.length -1; low=0
  • mid = (low + high) >> 1
  • å¾ªç¯ç»ˆæ­¢æ¡ä»¶ï¼šlow <= highï¼Œä¸æ˜¯low<high
  • è·³å‡ºå¾ªç¯æ—¶ï¼Œlow != high

ç®—æ³•åº”ç”¨

//numä¸ºå‡åºæ•°ç»„
public int search(int[] nums, int target){
    int low=0; int high= num.length-1; int mid;
    while(low <= high){
        mid = (low+high) >> 1;
        if(nums[mid] == target){
            return mid;
        }else if(nums[mid] < target){
            low = mid +1;
        }else{
            high = mid -1;
        }
    }
}
